solution_line_template: Jackson gets a total of {jackson_fishes_per_day}x{competition_days}= <<{jackson_fishes_per_day}*{competition_days}={jackson_total_fishes}>>{jackson_total_fishes} fishes after the competition.
Jonah gets {jonah_fishes_per_day}x{competition_days}= <<{jonah_fishes_per_day}*{competition_days}={jonah_total_fishes}>>{jonah_total_fishes} fishes after the competition.
And George was able to get {george_fishes_per_day}x{competition_days}=<<{george_fishes_per_day}*{competition_days}={george_total_fishes}>>{george_total_fishes} fishes after the competition.

Therefore the total fishes they were able to get for their team is {jackson_total_fishes}+{jonah_total_fishes}+{george_total_fishes}= <<{jackson_total_fishes}+{jonah_total_fishes}+{george_total_fishes}={total_team_fishes}>>{total_team_fishes}.
